Welcome Truthseekers,

My name is Caelan, but you can call me Cale or "ChiefTruth". I have many exciting adventures planned for the road ahead. This is the early stages of something I hope brings joy, beauty and goodness to the world. For now, I'm working on a project very close to my heart. If my first project below interests you, please check back often for updates. I hope you will join me as this site grows and thank you for visiting ChiefTruth Projects!

ChiefTruth Running Journey Journal

Experience the daily life of an endurance runner! This journal covers my 100 day journey into the world of ultra-marathons. At approximately twenty-five day intervals, I attempt a 25+ mile run. No bib-no chorales-no finish line-no pressure to go fast; just piles of miles to run and my will to transport my body with my legs for long distances.

While there likely could be a day that I race again, for this project, my only intention is to run twenty-five miles on four separate days within a 100 day period. This is primarily being used as a way to introduce myself to ultramarathons, which are 26.219 miles. At least one out of the four of my attempts will be technically an ultra.

The feather above will get you started on this adventure!

Access to this area of ChiefTruth Projects requires that you enter the correct date. Enter in the format: "mmddyy".
